categories: Category:Battles of the Yuuzhan Vong War

nodes.text: During the Yuuzhan Vong invasion, the Yuuzhan Vong decimated the galactic financial centre of Muunilinst controlled by the Imperial Remnant and headquarters of the InterGalactic Banking Clan. The planet itself was bombarded from orbit, reducing it to a wasteland from which the Yuuzhan Vong plucked any survivors for use as slave labor.
